load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

find derivatives
```{r}

my_derivative <- D(expr = expression(x^2), name = "x")
my_derivative

x <- 3
eval(my_derivative)

my_derivative <- D(expr = expression(2*(3*x+2)^4-5), name = "x")
my_derivative

x <- 1.2
eval(my_derivative)

```

make penguin plot
```{r}

ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)) +
  geom_point(aes(color=species)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("darkred", "orange", "cyan3")) +
  labs(x = "Bill length (mm)",
       y = "Bill depth (mm)",
       title = "Palmer Penguins Bill Measurements")
```

jitter plot
```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = species, y = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(colour = species)) +
  labs(x = "Species",
       y = "Flipper length (mm)",
       title = "Palmer Penguins Flipper Length by Species")
